long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IMPORTANT: This extension requires AllWebID Password Manager for Windows, which is available at https://allwebid.com/Downloads.aspx

AllWebID Password Manager is an extremely secure and convenient single sign-on solution for websites and SaaS based applications. It allows you to create long and complicated passwords for your web accounts. It remembers the passwords, and enables you to securely log into your web accounts without ever typing in your passwords. 

AllWebID also makes form filling hassle free for you. You can fill out personal information on the internet, such as your address, phone numbers and payment details without ever typing them. 

Use AllWebID to generate strong passwords for all your logins. If you share a single web account with your friend or family, you can allow them to access your web account without letting them know the password. Share the web account access, not the password. AllWebID Password Manager helps you keep your passwords and personal data secure.
